name: Combo & Clot
description:
Warning: 

WebGL version: doesn't support controller using the new Unity input system. The Web version is just for player who wants to test the feeling of the game. To fully enjoy the multiplayer aspect of the game, please download the PC version. 

PC Version: Connect the second controller and press any key to join while you are in the hero selection scene. You will see an arrow spawning under the character. (Don't join the game when you are in game or in map selection by connecting another controller to avoid unexcepted result of the game)

This game needs to be played with minimum 2 controllers or 1 keyboard and 1 controller. Up to 4 controllers or 3 controller and 1 keyboard. And please be patient when you play the game because the game may have a certain amount of bugs related to the battling because I don't have time to test it with my friends that much due to coronavirus. Please comment below or send me an email if you find any bugs and I will fix them as soon as possible. I hope you like the game concept.

This game is a super smash bros like game that features several heroes to battle in a map. Currently there are 5 heroes and 3 map, each hero featuring a different set of abilities. Each map with different and interesting mechanisms to play with. I will keep it a secret and you are going to find out in game.

 This game is designed to be a capstone project for the my last semester in college. Now I have been working on it for two months after school. Even though I have seven courses this semester, I will still find time to work on it to add more features. You can expect more heroes to play, make maps to choose from, and hopefully there will be a campaign mode and online multiplayer support. (I am still learning and improving my programming skill so I can't tell you the exact day when these features will be released.) If you like my idea, please support me in Kickstarter and I will try my best to add make the game even better!

How to control: 

For Keyboard (Controller): 

Move: Arrow Keys (Left Joystick)

Attack: X ( X )

Dash: C ( R2 )

Skill1: A ( Y )

Skill2: S ( B )

Skill3: D ( R1 )

Ultimate: F ( L1 )

Confirm In Menu: Enter ( X )

(You have cooldown for normal skill and a gauge to fulfill before you can use your ultimate, beware of that)

(Bat Hero's ultimate needs to be used when you are dashing)
